participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Evelyn is passionate about her work and enjoys expressing herself through music. She's adventurous and has a carefree spirit.
participant_1.background: I spend my day engineering sustainable solutions for the environment while listening to the Rolling Stones. I sometimes drive fast. I think I need a vacation. I sing many songs. I do not know if I enjoy programming, or if it's my only choice.

participant_2.name: Lucas
participant_2.personality: Lucas is quirky and loves to embrace his individuality. He has a playful attitude and enjoys the thrill of new experiences.
participant_2.background: I'm a klutz, but I'm still proud of my comic book collection. I'm not married, I enjoy my freedom and the thrill of competition. I am a bit of an oddball, but I try to get along with my family. I enjoy hiking. My favorite outfit is thigh-high leather boots and a skirt.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I like to hike and collect comic books.
I love hiking too! Where is your favorite place to hike?
I love hiking in the mountains. I live in Colorado so I have plenty of options.
I've never been to Colorado, but I've heard it's beautiful.
It is! I love it here.
What are some of your favorite comic books?
I love Marvel comics. My favorite character is Spider-Man.
I like Spider-Man too! He's always been one of my favorites.
He's a great character. Do you like any other Marvel comics?
I like the X-Men and the Avengers.
Those are great comics too! I love the X-Men.
I think they're so cool.
They are!
What other hobbies do you have?
I like to play video games and watch movies.
I like video games too! What kind of games do you like to play?
I like action-adventure games and RPGs.
I like those too! We should play games together sometime.
That would be fun!
Great! I'll send you my gamer tag.
